data.oai_dc:dc: Schuermann_Figure_3 - contains Excel-data on HhC85S multimerization and demonstrates that HhNC85S, a non-lipidated artificial Hh variant, does not act in dominant-negative manner. Contains Prize-Files to quantify unaffected wing patterning in three independently derived HhNC85S lines. The original wing patterns are shown in folders en>HhNC85S and ptc>HhNC85S.
